html:
You canâ€™t measure madness
A boar wont eat a wolf
Clown will dance on stage
Strong man lift a weight
When there is shootout on front
Flowers bloom in the garden
Wind carries their scent
Which hits the nostrils
When a prism transforms light
A pit is being dug
Another man will lay there
Forgotten by everyone
A tank crawls consequently
Horse snorts in gallop
Satilete transmits signal
A stomped cigarette dims
title: Cigarette
